statements: SELECT * FROM traffic_violations;
SELECT violation_id, vehicle_id, violation_date FROM traffic_violations;
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Speeding';
SELECT violation_id, violation_type, violation_location FROM traffic_violations ORDER BY violation_date DESC;
SELECT violation_date, violation_description FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_location LIKE '%highway%';
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Speeding' ORDER BY violation_date DESC;
SELECT violation_type, COUNT(*) AS total_violations FROM traffic_violations GROUP BY violation_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_violations DESC;
SELECT violation_date, violation_location FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_location LIKE '%Highway%' ORDER BY violation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations WHERE vehicle_id = '937b6a48-3572-4fcf-a462-d37f78469cc1' AND violation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT violation_id, violation_type, violation_description FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND violation_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY violation_type ASC, violation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations;
SELECT violation_id, violation_date, violation_amount FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_type='Speeding';
SELECT * FROM violators WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT name, license_number FROM violators ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT violation_id, violation_type, violation_amount FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY violation_date DESC;
SELECT violator_id, name, address FROM violators WHERE name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY violator_id ASC;
SELECT violation_id, violation_type, violation_amount FROM traffic_violations WHERE vehicle_registration = 'XYZ123' ORDER BY violation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations JOIN violators ON traffic_violations.violation_id = violators.violator_id WHERE violation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND violation_amount < 5000;

SELECT v.name, v.address, t.violation_type, t.violation_amount FROM violators v JOIN traffic_violations t ON v.violator_id = t.violation_id WHERE v.phone_number LIKE '%1234%' ORDER BY v.name ASC, t.violation_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations;
SELECT violation_id, violation_date, fine_amount FROM traffic_violations WHERE vehicle_plate_number = 'XYZ123';
SELECT vehicle_plate_number, violation_type FROM traffic_violations WHERE fine_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM violation_locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
SELECT location_name, city, state, country FROM violation_locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT violation_id, violation_type, violation_date FROM traffic_violations ORDER BY violation_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_plate_number, violation_type, fine_amount FROM traffic_violations WHERE fine_amount > 100 ORDER BY fine_amount DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob, driver_license_number FROM violators WHERE dob BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT location_name, city, state, country FROM violation_locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_date > '2021-01-01' AND violation_type LIKE '%Speeding%';
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations ORDER BY violation_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT violation_type, violation_location FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT officers.name, officers.department, violations_history.violation_date FROM officers JOIN violations_history ON officers.id = violations_history.officer_id;

SELECT violators.name, violators.phone_number, violations_history.violation_notes FROM violators JOIN violations_history ON violators.id = violations_history.violator_id WHERE violations_history.violation_id = 123;
SELECT vehicle_license_plate, violation_location, violation_date FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Speeding' AND violation_location LIKE '%Highway%' ORDER BY violation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT violation_type, violation_location FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY violation_location DESC;
SELECT violators.name, officers.department FROM violators INNER JOIN officers ON violators.id = officers.id;
SELECT v.id, v.violation_type, o.name AS officer_name FROM traffic_violations v JOIN officers o ON v.id = o.id;

SELECT vh.violation_date, vh.violation_notes, v.vehicle_license_plate FROM violations_history vh JOIN traffic_violations v ON vh.violation_id = v.id WHERE vh.officer_id = 3 ORDER BY vh.violation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Speeding';
SELECT driver_name, violation_date FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Parking Violation';
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM violation_locations WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT officer_name, department FROM violation_officers WHERE department = 'Traffic Police';
SELECT violation_id, fine_amount, points_given FROM violation_penalties WHERE fine_amount > 1000;

SELECT * FROM traffic_violations JOIN violation_locations ON traffic_violations.violation_id = violation_locations.violation_id JOIN violation_officers ON traffic_violations.violation_id = violation_officers.officer_id JOIN violation_penalties ON traffic_violations.violation_id = violation_penalties.violation_id JOIN violation_images ON traffic_violations.violation_id = violation_images.violation_id WHERE violation_penalties.points_given > 5 ORDER BY violation_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT driver_name, violation_type, fine_amount FROM traffic_violations JOIN violation_penalties ON traffic_violations.violation_id = violation_penalties.violation_id WHERE violation_penalties.fine_amount > 500 ORDER BY violation_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT location_name, city, state, officer_name FROM violation_locations JOIN violation_officers ON violation_locations.violation_id = violation_officers.officer_id WHERE violation_officers.department = 'Traffic Department' ORDER BY location_name ASC, city DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT DISTINCT driver_name, city FROM traffic_violations JOIN violation_locations ON traffic_violations.violation_id = violation_locations.violation_id WHERE violation_locations.city IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles') ORDER BY driver_name ASC, city ASC LIMIT 7;

SELECT violation_type, SUM(fine_amount) AS total_fines FROM traffic_violations JOIN violation_penalties ON traffic_violations.violation_id = violation_penalties.violation_id GROUP BY violation_type HAVING total_fines > 1000 ORDER BY total_fines DESC;
